settings.heading: Calling All Creators
settings.desc: Let your creativity run wild with HyperX creator-focused gear & get the setup you need to succeed!

settings.heading: Title with Description
settings.description_col_1:
Whether you're a seasoned creator or a fresh face in the streaming universe, HyperX is here to take your content to the next level. Our creator-focused gear goes beyond being great for gaming to help you turn your dreams into streams.

So let your creativity run wild, HyperX is here for it! Get the streaming setup you need to succeed, and join the vibrant community sharing their incredible victories, good vibes, and captivating streams! üéÆüéôÔ∏èüé•

settings.title: Available Now!
settings.subtitle: Check out all our latest creator products.

settings.desc: This compact USB 3-track mixer features simple, intuitive controls so you won‚Äôt bring your recording to an abrupt halt as you attempt to figure out a bunch of frustrating buttons. With 3 faders and individual volume knobs for line and headphone outputs, you can easily find your perfect balance of mic, voice chat, and game audio.

The HyperX Caster Microphone and Camera Arm is a great piece of kit for streamers and content creators. It features a fully toolless installation[4] for a streamlined, simple setup process, so you can skip the frustrating step of trying to hunt down the right screwdriver or wrench when you just want to make a simple adjustment.

The HyperX Vision S webcam was built for all levels of creator, from the meticulous auteurs to the avid sharers. Put the focus on your talents with the 8MP Sony Starvis‚Ñ¢ IMX415 sensor that captures video in 4K clarity. Capture a broad 90¬∫ view, perfect for showcasing all of your carefully curated aesthetic. The Vision S is capable of recording in 4K at 30fps, and 1080p at 60fps to showcase every detail in motion.

The HyperX ProCast is a professional-grade condenser microphone with an XLR connection built for people who make a living with their voices. Capture more details in your recordings thanks to the cardioid gold-sputtered large diaphragm condenser capsule. The ProCast‚Äôs included anti-vibration shock mount and snap on HyperX Shield pop filter work together to help reduce unwanted rumbles and pops in your recordings.

Designed for streamers and creators who want precise audio control, this compact USB 3-track audio mixer has easy-to-use controls. Ditch confusing buttons and controls and welcome uninterrupted recording. With 3 faders and separate volume knobs for line and headphone outputs, finding your perfect balance between your microphone, voice chat, and game audio is incredibly simple. Once your mixer is set-up, give your voice recordings a professional touch with the ProCast microphone. It features a high-end XLR connection, plus an anti-vibration shock mount and an included HyperX Shield pop filter, which all work harmoniously to quiet unwanted noise.

settings.subtitle_text: The Ultimate Platform for gamers and creators
settings.desc: Built for streaming and creativity. Fast track your content with NVIDIA Encoder, NVIDIA Broadcast App, and NVIDIA Studio.

settings.title: Discover Additional Gear For Content Creation
settings.subtitle: Whether you're diving into the world of content creation, podcasting, or taking on the challenges of live streaming, HyperX gear can help you elevate your performance and improve your audience's experience.
